source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FCTREFASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % spEst %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [Fund_ID]
      ,[Asset_ID]
      ,[DatabaseName]
      ,[Group_ID]
      ,[Attribute_id]
      ,[Origin_id]
      ,[Asset_Offset]
      ,[Version_name]
      ,[IsProcessed]
	  ,'sp_FSOPConsolidated' AS sp_FSOPConsolidated
	  ,'sp_FSOPEstate' AS sp_FSOPEstate
	  ,'sp_FSOPOther' AS sp_FSOPOther
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spCon ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPConsolidated
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spEst ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPEstate
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spOth ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPOther
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' param ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_param
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
SELECT (SELECT Value FROM dbo.tbl_parameter WHERE Parameter = 'DescriptionYear') AS DescriptionYear ,  (SELECT Value FROM dbo.tbl_parameter WHERE Parameter = 'YearOffset') AS YearOffset

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % spCon %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % spOth %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % param %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT VERSION_NAME, COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
GROUP BY VERSION_NAME

SELECT VERSION_NAME, COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
GROUP BY VERSION_NAME

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

SELECT CASE WHEN OFFSET_ERROR IS NULL THEN '' ELSE OFFSET_ERROR END AS OFFSET_ERROR FROM (
SELECT 
stuff( (SELECT ', '+CONCAT(FAR.Fund_ID,'  ',FAR.Asset_ID,'  ',FAR.Version_name,
'  Asset-Ref-Asset-Offset: ',FAR.Asset_Offset,'  Parameter-Asset-Offset: ',FCP.Asset_offset)
FROM relational.Forecast_Asset_reference FAR
JOIN staging.Forecast_Param FCP
ON FAR.Fund_ID = FCP.Fund_ID AND FAR.Asset_ID = FCP.Asset_ID 
AND FAR.Version_name = FCP.Version_name
WHERE FAR.Asset_Offset < CAST(FCP.Asset_offset AS INT) 
AND FAR.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND FAR.IsProcessed = 0
ORDER BY FAR.Version_name
FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') AS OFFSET_ERROR
)x

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ASS.[Fund_ID]\n      ,ASS.[Asset_ID]\n      ,[DatabaseName]\n      ,[Group_ID]\n      ,[Attribute_id]\n      ,[Origin_id]\n      ,[Asset_Offset]\n      ,[Version_name]\nFROM [staging].[Forecast_Asset_reference] STA\nLEFT JOIN [relational].Asset ASS\nON STA.Fund_ID = ASS.Fund_ID AND STA.Asset_ID = ASS.Asset_ID\nWHERE ASS.record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string,
		IsProcessed as integer,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[DatabaseName]\n      ,[Group_ID]\n      ,[Attribute_id]\n      ,[Origin_id]\n      ,[Asset_Offset]\n      ,[Version_name]\n	  ,[IsProcessed]\n      ,[start_datetime]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,DatabaseName,Group_ID,Attribute_id,Origin_id,Asset_Offset,Version_name,toInteger('0'))) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Version_name == Relation_Version_name,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,DatabaseName,Group_ID,Attribute_id,Origin_id,Asset_Offset,Version_name,IsProcessed)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_DatabaseName = DatabaseName,
		Relation_Group_ID = Group_ID,
		Relation_Attribute_id = Attribute_id,
		Relation_Origin_id = Origin_id,
		Relation_Asset_Offset = Asset_Offset,
		Relation_Version_name = Version_name,
		Relation_IsProcessed = IsProcessed,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		IsProcessed = toInteger('0')) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		IsProcessed = toInteger('0')) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name,
		IsProcessed,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName = Relation_DatabaseName,
		Group_ID = Relation_Group_ID,
		Attribute_id = Relation_Attribute_id,
		Origin_id = Relation_Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset = Relation_Asset_Offset,
		Version_name = Relation_Version_name,
		IsProcessed = Relation_IsProcessed,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string,
		IsProcessed as integer,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Version_name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset,
		Version_name,
		IsProcessed,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \n --REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS REF_ASSET_OFFSET , PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS PAR_ASSET_OFFSET, PAR.DESC_YEAR, DAT.PERIOD,\n CASE WHEN REF.ASSET_OFFSET = PAR.ASSET_OFFSET \n          THEN DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT)-(CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)-CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT))-1,CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n          ELSE DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT)-(CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)-CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n END AS Period_Date,\n REF.FUND_ID AS Fund_ID,\n REF.ASSET_ID AS Asset_ID,\n DAT.STATUS AS Status, \n DAT.PRODUCT AS Product, \n PRD.GL_CODE AS GL_Code,\n CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(100)) AS Cash_Flow_Code,\n ABS(( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) )) AS Perpetual_Amount,\n CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Current_Amount, \n CAST(CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Future_Amount,\n CASE WHEN ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\' ElSE \'CR\' END AS Debit_Credit,\n \'Forecast\' AS Forecast_Type,\n REF.VERSION_NAME AS Version_name\nFROM RELATIONAL.FORECAST_ASSET_REFERENCE REF\nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_PARAM PAR\nON REF.FUND_ID = PAR.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = PAR.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = PAR.VERSION_NAME \nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_DATA DAT\nON REF.FUND_ID = DAT.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = DAT.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = DAT.VERSION_NAME \nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.FORECAST_GL_PRODUCT_MAP PRD\nON DAT.STATUS = PRD.STATUS AND PRD.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nWHERE REF.ISPROCESSED = 0 AND REF.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0 \nAND DAT.STATUS != \'\' AND DAT.STATUS IS NOT NULL\nAND CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) >= CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)\nAND CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) >= CASE WHEN (CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) - CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)) = 0 \n    THEN 1 ELSE (CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) - CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)) END',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
AddAuditColumns alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0))) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(input(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
ConvertAmountToValidFormat select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = case(greaterOrEqual(toDecimal(Amount),0),'DR','CR'),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2)),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset split(not(isNull(GL_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF)
TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Relation_Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCasfFlowData
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectCasfFlowData, SelectInvalidFundAssetData union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(GL_Code = trim(GL_Code,'\'')) ~> TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB
